item.title: Robinhood Weighs Delisting Crypto Assets Deemed Securities By the SEC | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Robinhood (NASDAQ: HOOD), the public-listed commission-free investing platform is now weighing its crypto offerings after the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) initiated a crackdown on two of the biggest crypto exchanges – Binance and Coinbase. On Tuesday, June 6, Dan Gallagher, Robinhood’s legal chief appraised the US Congress of this situation. Gallagher is himself

The post Robinhood Weighs Delisting Crypto Assets Deemed Securities By the SEC appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: SEC Asks to Freeze Binance.US Assets, Funds Are SAFU Says Binance | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
A day after slapping a lawsuit on crypto exchange Binance, the SEC requested the court to freeze the assets of Binance.US on Tuesday evening. The SEC also asked the judge to repatriate both fiat and crypto held by Binance.US’s customers. The request for the freezing order applies to the Binance.Us companies and not to the

The post SEC Asks to Freeze Binance.US Assets, Funds Are SAFU Says Binance appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
